titles.title: It Is Good To Give Thanks

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is good to give thanks To the Lord and to sing praises To His name, Oh Most High To declare His loving kindness In the morning and by night. (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And with a ten stringed lute and with the harp With resounding musicÂ on the lyre. For Thou O Lord has made me glad By what You have done.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And I will sing for joy At the works of Your hands How great are Your works, Oh Lord. Your thoughts are very deep.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is good to give thanks To the Lord and to sing praises To His name, Oh Most High To declare His loving kindness In the morning and by night.{/lang-eng}
